data.question: What is the empirical formula for ZnZn-RPM?
What technique was used for gas chromatography in the synthesis and characterization of ligands and RPMs?
data.answer: HP 5890 instrument equipped with an HP-5 capillary column and an FID detector

data.question: What was the yield percentage for the synthesis of ZnMn-RPM?
What is the purpose of using supercritical CO2 processing in the synthesis of RPMs?
data.answer: To activate the materials by removing the solvent, ensuring the MOFs are ready for use

data.question: What was the surface area of ZnMn-RPM as determined by NLDFT analysis?
Is the phenomenon of MOFs not taking up nitrogen under cryogenic conditions (77K) well understood?
data.answer: No, the phenomenon is poorly understood

data.question: What was the main reason for the differences in peak intensities between experimental and simulated PXRD patterns?
data.answer: The preferential orientation of the crystallites on the measurement platform

data.question: Did the resolvated ZnMn-RPM retain its porosity after solvent evacuation?
data.answer: Yes, the porosity of the material is essentially completely retained upon solvent evacuation

data.question: What was the catalyst used for the styrene epoxidation reaction?
What was the outcome when comparing catalytic activity for styrene epoxidation by ZnMn-RPM and a homogeneous counterpart?
data.answer: ZnMn-RPM functioned for more turnovers, stopping only because of depletion of oxidant, while the homogeneous catalyst showed complete deactivation after fewer turnovers

data.question: What was the method used to confirm the retention of porosity in ZnMn-RPM after activation and resolvation?
What was the reaction yield for the oxidation of cyclohexane using ZnMn-RPM as a catalyst?
Is the activation procedure for ZnMn-RPM optimized?
data.answer: No, the activation procedure was not optimized

data.question: What was the main challenge in obtaining high-quality datasets for FeMn-RPM crystals?
data.answer: The datasets did not show high enough quality in spot mosaicity and/or resolution to allow a full structure refinement

data.question: What was the theoretical Mn/Zn ratio for ZnMn-RPM according to ICP-OES analysis?
Did the use of a spinning capillary sample holder completely eliminate preferential orientation in PXRD patterns?
data.answer: No, some preferential orientation still occurs with the spinning capillary sample holder

data.question: What was the main reason for employing carbon dioxide at near ambient temperature as a probe molecule in gas adsorption analyses?
data.answer: Because ZnMn-RPM does not take up nitrogen under cryogenic conditions (77K)

data.question: What was the main finding from the comparison of catalytic activity for styrene epoxidation by ZnMn-RPM and a homogeneous Mn-metalloporphyrin?
data.answer: ZnMn-RPM showed much greater stability and functioned for more turnovers than the homogeneous Mn-metalloporphyrin

data.question: What was the method used for the synthesis of (5,15-Dipyridyl-10,20-bis(pentafluorophenyl))porphyrinato manganese (III) chloride [L2-Mn(Cl)]?
data.answer: Dissolving in glacial acetic acid, microwave heating, and recrystallization by slow addition of water

data.question: What was the main advantage of using supercritical CO2 processing in the activation of RPMs?
data.answer: It prevents the collapse of the framework by effectively removing the solvent without damaging the structure
